description: Matilda Ajan is an officer of the Federation Forces` supply corps, who appears whenever the White Base`s need is most dire in order to deliver vital supplies, new equipment, and repair services. She also seems to function as a personal envoy for General Revil, carrying messages back and forth between this high-ranking commander and the beleaguered ship. And not only is pretty Matilda the White Base`s guardian angel, but also the dream girl of its lovestruck male crew.
name: Matilda Ajan
